pages.text: Different Vegetable ingredients have different veggie values.$(br2)$(l)Foods with veggie value of 0.25$()$(br)$(item)Fern$(), $(item)Sea Pickle$(), $(br)$(item)Cactus$(), $(item)Dried Kelp$()$(br2)$(l)Foods with veggie value of 0.5$()$(br)$(item)Brown Mushroom$(), $(item)Red Mushroom$(), $(br)$(item)Chorus Flower$(), $(item)Large Fern$(), $(br)$(item)Poisonous Potato$(), $(item)Beetroot$(), $(br)$(item)Popcorn$()

$(l)Foods with veggie value of 1.0$()$(br)$(item)Pumpkin$(), $(item)Carrot$(), $(br)$(item)Potato$(), $(item)Baked Potato$(), $(br)$(item)Asparagus$(), $(item)Corn$(), $(br)$(item)Onion$(), $(item)Toma Root$()
